author: stroucki
msg: rpyc-3.2 removes tlslite, so provide an equivalent using ssl

author: szetszwo
msg: HDFS-2887. FSVolume, is a part of FSDatasetInterface implementation, should not be referred outside FSDataset.  A new FSVolumeInterface is defined.  The BlockVolumeChoosingPolicy.chooseVolume(..) method signature is also updated.  (szetszwo)
